SELECT R.REQ_ID PK_COL , R.REQ_ID , DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY R.CRT_DT || R.REQ_ID DESC) RNUM , R.CRT_DT , R.CRTR , R.MDFY_DT , R.MDFYR , R.USE_YN , R.DEL_YN , R.DTL_REQ , TO_CHAR(R.STRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') STRT_DT , TO_CHAR(R.EXPCT_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') EXPCT_END_DT , R.ATTCH , R.PRJ_ID , R.MN_DVLPR , R.TST_RSLT , R.TSK_STTS , R.PRCS_STTS , RSLT_CD.CD_NM RSLT_CD_NM , TSK_CD.CD_NM TSK_CD_NM , PRCS_CD.CD_NM PRCS_CD_NM , R.PRRTY , R.REQ_TTL , R.REQ_CNFR_NM , PJ.PRJ_NM PJ_PRJ_NM , TST.TSTR_ID TST_TSTR_ID , TSTR_E.L_NM TSTR_E_L_NM , TSTR_E.F_NM TSTR_E_F_NM FROM REQ R INNER JOIN PRJ PJ ON R.PRJ_ID = PJ.PRJ_ID INNER JOIN CMN_CD RSLT_CD ON R.TST_RSLT = RSLT_CD.CD_ID INNER JOIN CMN_CD TSK_CD ON R.TSK_STTS = TSK_CD.CD_ID INNER JOIN CMN_CD PRCS_CD ON R.PRCS_STTS = PRCS_CD.CD_ID LEFT JOIN REQ_TSTR TST ON R.REQ_ID = TST.REQ_ID LEFT JOIN EMP TSTR_E ON TST.TSTR_ID = TSTR_E.EMP_ID WHERE R.DEL_YN = 'N'
